name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Herman FULLER, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Herman FULLER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: D. Webster Keogh, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Franklin Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 498
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Herman FULLER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
D. Webster Keogh, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Franklin Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
